trans-unit.source: Manages storage of profile information for an ASP.NET application in a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: 在 SQL Server 資料庫中，管理 ASP.NET 應用程式設定檔資訊的存放。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET profile is used to store and retrieve user settings in a data source such as a database.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 設定檔用來儲存和擷取資料來源，例如資料庫中的使用者設定。

trans-unit.source: The user profile is accessed using the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: 使用存取使用者設定檔<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Profile%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>。

trans-unit.source: Profile information and property values are managed using a profile provider.
trans-unit.target: 使用設定檔提供者管理設定檔資訊和屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> class is used by ASP.NET to store and retrieve profile settings for an ASP.NET application that is using a SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>類別可由 ASP.NET 來儲存和擷取設定檔設定 ASP.NET 應用程式所使用的 SQL Server 資料庫。

trans-unit.source: To use a <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>, you must first create the SQL Server database used by the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>，您必須先建立所使用的 SQL Server 資料庫<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>。

trans-unit.source: To create the database used by the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>, run the aspnet_regsql.exe tool, which is found in the [*drive*:]\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\`2.0versionNumber` folder, and specify the **-A p** option.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立所使用的資料庫<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>，執行 aspnet_regsql.exe 工具，可在中找到 [*磁碟機*:] \WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\\ `2.0versionNumber`資料夾中，並指定**-p**選項。

trans-unit.source: The following command demonstrates how you might use the aspnet_regsql.exe executable:
trans-unit.target: 下列命令示範如何使用 aspnet_regsql.exe 可執行檔：

trans-unit.source: The example above does not specify a name for the database that is created, so the default name will be used.
trans-unit.target: 上述範例未指定建立時，資料庫的名稱，因此會使用預設名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default database name is Aspnetdb.
trans-unit.target: 預設的資料庫名稱是 Aspnetdb。

trans-unit.source: The machine configuration contains a default <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> instance named AspNetSqlProvider that connects to the SQL Server on the local machine.
trans-unit.target: 電腦組態包含預設<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>名為 Languagekeyword>aspnetsqlprovider< 連接到本機電腦上的 SQL Server 執行個體。

trans-unit.source: You can use this instance of the provider, or specify your own in the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的提供者，這個執行個體或指定您自己的 Web.config 檔案中為 ASP.NET 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: If the profile provider is configured with a connection string that uses integrated security, the process account of the ASP.NET application must have rights to connect to the SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: 如果設定檔提供者的連接字串來使用整合式的安全性設定，ASP.NET 應用程式的處理序帳戶必須具有權限可以連線到 SQL Server 資料庫。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application configured to use a <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範設定為使用 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET calls the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> class using the values specified in the configuration file for the application.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.%23ctor%2A>建構函式建立的執行個體<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>類別使用的應用程式組態檔中指定的值。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式不是從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the application for which to store and retrieve profile information.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定應用程式的名稱，以儲存及擷取設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: The name of the application for which to store and retrieve profile information.
trans-unit.target: 要儲存及擷取設定檔資訊的應用程式名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is the <see cref="P:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.ApplicationVirtualPath" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see cref="P:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.ApplicationVirtualPath" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property is used by the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> to associate profile information with different applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A>屬性供<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>與不同的應用程式設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: This enables multiple applications to use the same database to store user information without running into conflicts between duplicate users.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓多個應用程式使用相同的資料庫來儲存使用者資訊而不重複的使用者之間發生衝突。

trans-unit.source: Multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same user database by specifying the same value in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 多個 ASP.NET 應用程式可以使用相同的使用者資料庫，藉由指定相同值的<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the configuration file for the Web application using the `applicationName` attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A>屬性可以設定以程式設計的方式，或是可以設定以宣告方式在 Web 應用程式使用的組態檔中`applicationName`屬性。

trans-unit.source: If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file for the Web application, then the <xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.ApplicationVirtualPath%2A> value is used for ASP.NET applications.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定值`applicationName`Web 應用程式組態檔中的屬性則<xref:System.Web.Hosting.HostingEnvironment.ApplicationVirtualPath%2A>值用於 ASP.NET 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: For non-ASP.NET applications, the default value is the <xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleName%2A> value without the file extension.
trans-unit.target: 對於非 ASP.NET 應用程式，預設值是<xref:System.Diagnostics.ProcessModule.ModuleName%2A>不含副檔名的值。

trans-unit.source: Because a single default profile provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 因為所有由提供服務的要求會使用單一預設設定檔提供者執行個體<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>物件，您可以有多個要求同時執行，而且嘗試設定<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A>屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A>屬性不是執行緒安全的多個寫入，且變更<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A>屬性值可能會導致非預期的行為，應用程式的多個使用者。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property unless you must.
trans-unit.target: 建議您避免撰寫程式碼，讓使用者設定<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A>屬性除非必要，否則。

trans-unit.source: An example of an application where setting the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property may be required is an administrative application that manages profile data for multiple applications.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式的範例設定<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A>屬性可能需要為系統管理的應用程式管理多個應用程式的設定檔資料。

trans-unit.source: Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application.
trans-unit.target: 這類應用程式應該在單一使用者應用程式並不是 Web 應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範中的項目`system.web`的 ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案區段。

trans-unit.source: It specifies the application's <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> instance and sets the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property value to `MyApplication`.
trans-unit.target: 它會指定應用程式的<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>執行個體和設定<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A>屬性值設定為`MyApplication`。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName" /> property by a caller that does not have <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.High" /> ASP.NET hosting permission.
trans-unit.target: 不具 <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName" /> ASP.NET 裝載使用權限的呼叫端嘗試設定 <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.High" /> 屬性。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName" /> property to a string that is longer than 256 characters.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將 <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName" /> 屬性設定為超過 256 個字元的字串。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are deleted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> 的其中一個值，指定是否要刪除匿名、已驗證或是這兩種類型的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that identifies which user profiles are considered inactive.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，識別哪些使用者設定檔視為非現用。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate" /> of a user profile occurs on or before this date and time, the profile is considered inactive.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔的 <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate" /> 發生在這個日期與時間或之前，則會將其視為非使用中設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Deletes user profile data for profiles in which the last activity date occurred before the specified date and time.
trans-unit.target: 刪除設定檔的使用者設定檔資料，其中設定檔的上次活動日期是發生在指定的日期和時間之前。

trans-unit.source: The number of profiles deleted from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源中刪除的設定檔數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.DeleteInactiveProfiles%2A> method is used to remove unused profile data from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.DeleteInactiveProfiles%2A>方法用來從指定的應用程式的資料來源中移除未使用的設定檔資料`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Of the searched profiles, any profile with a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is deleted.
trans-unit.target: 任何設定檔的搜尋的設定檔與<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>，就會發生在或之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`會刪除參數值。

trans-unit.source: The database updates that are performed during the call to the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.DeleteInactiveProfiles%2A> method are made within a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 會在呼叫期間執行資料庫更新<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.DeleteInactiveProfiles%2A>方法在交易內進行。

trans-unit.source: If an error is encountered, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生錯誤，交易回復，並會執行任何更新。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示的 ASP.NET 網頁，管理非使用中的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: A button is provided to delete all profiles that have not been accessed since the date specified for considering a profile to be inactive.
trans-unit.target: 提供的按鈕來刪除未存取自指定的日期的考慮設定檔為非作用中的所有設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Deletes profile properties and information from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源刪除設定檔屬性和資訊。

trans-unit.source: A string array of user names for profiles to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 字串陣列，包含要刪除的設定檔之使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Deletes profile properties and information from the data source for the supplied list of user names.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源刪除提供的使用者名稱清單之設定檔屬性和資訊。

trans-unit.source: The number of profiles deleted from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源中刪除的設定檔數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A> method deletes all profile information and properties for the specified profiles from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A>方法會從指定的應用程式的資料來源刪除所有設定檔資訊和指定的設定檔屬性`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The list of profiles to delete is specified as a string array of user names.
trans-unit.target: 若要刪除的設定檔的清單已指定為使用者名稱的字串陣列。

trans-unit.source: If profile properties and information exist in the data source for a user name in the `usernames` parameter, they are deleted.
trans-unit.target: 如果設定檔內容及資訊存在於資料來源中的使用者名稱`usernames`參數，就會刪除它們。

trans-unit.source: The return value may differ from the length of the specified array of `usernames`.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的值可能不同於指定之陣列的長度`usernames`。

trans-unit.source: This indicates that some of the profiles in the specified array of `usernames` were already deleted from the data store.
trans-unit.target: 這表示指定的陣列中的設定檔的某些`usernames`已經從資料存放區刪除。

trans-unit.source: The database updates that are performed during the call to the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A> method are made within a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 會在呼叫期間執行資料庫更新<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A>方法在交易內進行。

trans-unit.source: If an error is encountered, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生錯誤，交易回復，並會執行任何更新。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示的 ASP.NET 網頁，管理非使用中的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays the inactive profiles returned.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項會顯示傳回非作用中的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Each row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control includes a button that deletes the profile for that row from the data source with a call to the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 每個資料列的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項包含一個按鈕，刪除該資料列的設定檔資料來源藉由呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The length of <paramref name="usernames" /> is zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="usernames" /> 的長度為零。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
One of the items in <paramref name="usernames" /> is an empty string (""), exceeds a length of 256 characters, or contains a comma.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="usernames" /> 的其中一個項目為空字串 ("")、長度超過 256 個字元或者包含逗號。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
Two or more items in <paramref name="usernames" /> have the same value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="usernames" /> 中有兩個以上的項目有相同的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="usernames" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="usernames" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
One of the items in <paramref name="usernames" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="usernames" /> 的其中一個項目為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" /> that contains profile information for profiles to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" />，包含要刪除之設定檔的設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Deletes profile properties and information for the supplied list of profiles from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源刪除提供的設定檔清單之設定檔屬性和資訊。

trans-unit.source: The number of profiles deleted from the data source.
trans-unit.target: 從資料來源中刪除的設定檔數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A> method deletes all profile information and properties for the specified profiles from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A>方法會從指定的應用程式的資料來源刪除所有設定檔資訊和指定的設定檔屬性`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The list of profiles to delete is specified using a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> that is passed as the `profiles` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的設定檔，以刪除清單<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>傳遞做為`profiles`參數。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> can be returned from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>可從傳回<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The return value may differ from the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection.Count%2A> value for the supplied <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值，可能會有所不同<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection.Count%2A>所提供的值<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>。

trans-unit.source: This indicates that some of the profiles in the specified <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> were no longer found in the data store.
trans-unit.target: 這表示在指定的設定檔的某些<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>已導致找不到資料存放區中。

trans-unit.source: The database updates that are performed during the call to the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A> method are made within a transaction.
trans-unit.target: 會在呼叫期間執行資料庫更新<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A>方法在交易內進行。

trans-unit.source: If an error is encountered, the transaction is rolled back and no updates are performed.
trans-unit.target: 如果發生錯誤，交易回復，並會執行任何更新。

trans-unit.source: The following code example allows a user to search for profiles using the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者設定檔使用的搜尋<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The user can then delete the returned profiles with a call to the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可接著刪除傳回的設定檔，藉由呼叫<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.DeleteProfiles%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="profiles" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection.Count" /> value of zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="profiles" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection.Count" /> 值為零。

trans-unit.source: \- or -

One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo" /> objects in <paramref name="profiles" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.UserName" /> that is an empty string (""), exceeds a length of 256 characters, or contains a comma.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="profiles" /> 的其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo" /> 物件有一個 <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.UserName" /> 為空字串 ("")、長度超過 256 個字元或者包含逗號。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="profiles" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="profiles" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo" /> objects in <paramref name="profiles" /> has a <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.UserName" /> that is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="profiles" /> 的其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo" /> 物件有一個 <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.UserName" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are returned.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> 的其中一個值，指定是否要傳回匿名、已驗證或是這兩種類型的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The user name for which to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that identifies which user profiles are considered inactive.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，識別哪些使用者設定檔視為非現用。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate" /> of a user profile occurs on or before this date and time, the profile is considered inactive.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔的 <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate" /> 發生在這個日期與時間或之前，則會將其視為非使用中設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The index of the page of results to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的結果頁面索引。

trans-unit.source: <c>pageIndex</c> is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: <c>pageIndex</c> 以零為起始。

trans-unit.source: The size of the page of results to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的結果頁面大小。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an integer that identifies the total number of profiles.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，包含識別設定檔總數的整數。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves profile information for profiles in which the last activity date occurred on or before the specified date and time and the user name for the profile matches the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 擷取上次活動日期發生在指定日期和時間或之前，而且設定檔使用者名稱符合指定名稱的設定檔之設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" /> containing user profile information for inactive profiles where the user name matches the supplied <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" />，包含非現用設定檔的使用者設定檔資訊，其中使用者名稱符合所提供的 <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method is used to retrieve profile information for unused user profiles for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>方法用來擷取指定的應用程式的未使用的使用者設定檔的設定檔資訊`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method will only retrieve profiles for which the user name for the profile matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter value.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法只會擷取設定檔的使用者名稱符合所提供的設定檔`usernameToMatch`參數值。

trans-unit.source: Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Of the searched profiles, any profile with a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> that occurs before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 任何設定檔的搜尋的設定檔與<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>發生此情況之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`傳回參數的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> searches for a match of the `usernameToMatch` parameter value using the `LIKE` keyword and supports wildcard characters, such as the percent (%) sign.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>搜尋符合的項目`usernameToMatch`參數值使用`LIKE`關鍵字，並支援萬用字元，例如百分比 （%） 符號。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user1", then profile information for the profile with the user name of "user1" is returned, if it exists.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`usernameToMatch`參數設定為"user1"，則會傳回具有使用者名稱的設定檔的設定檔資訊，稱為"user1"，如果存在的話。

trans-unit.source: If the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user%", then profile information for profiles with the user name of "user1", "user2", "user_admin", and so on are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`usernameToMatch`參數設定為"user %"，則會傳回設定檔資訊的設定檔的使用者名稱為"user1"、"user2"、"user_admin"，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: Users are returned in the order that their profiles were added to the data store.
trans-unit.target: 使用者會傳回其設定檔已加入到資料存放區的順序。

trans-unit.source: The results returned by <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的結果<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。

trans-unit.source: The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> objects to return in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>.
trans-unit.target: `pageSize`參數識別的最大數目<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo>物件中傳回<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; 0 identifies the first page.
trans-unit.target: `pageIndex`參數識別要傳回的結果的分頁，則為 0 識別的第一頁。

trans-unit.source: The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為非作用中的使用者設定檔所設定的總數`applicationName`根據`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`參數。

trans-unit.source: For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> returned will contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果有設定 13 使用者`applicationName`，和`pageIndex`值為 1 以`pageSize`5，<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>傳回包含第 6 到第十個非使用中的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。

trans-unit.source: The following code example allows a user to supply a `usernameToMatch` value and a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption> and retrieves profile information for any matching profiles.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者提供`usernameToMatch`值和<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption>和擷取設定檔的任何相符的設定檔的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The example also allows the user to specify whether to return inactive profiles exclusively.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也可讓使用者能夠指定是否要以獨佔方式傳回非作用中的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: If the user specifies only inactive profiles, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method is called; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者指定只有非作用中設定檔，<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>方法是呼叫，否則<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> is an empty string ("") or exceeds 256 characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> 為空字串 ("") 或超過 256 個字元。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="pageIndex" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pageIndex" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="pageSize" /> is less than one.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pageSize" /> 小於一。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="pageIndex" /> multiplied by <paramref name="pageSize" /> is larger than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pageIndex" /> 乘以 <paramref name="pageSize" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are returned.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> 的其中一個值，指定是否要傳回匿名、已驗證或是這兩種類型的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The user name for which to search.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The index of the page of results to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的結果頁面索引。

trans-unit.source: <c>pageIndex</c> is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: <c>pageIndex</c> 以零為起始。

trans-unit.source: The size of the page of results to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的結果頁面大小。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an integer that identifies the total number of profiles.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，包含識別設定檔總數的整數。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves profile information for profiles in which the user name matches the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 擷取使用者名稱符合指定名稱的設定檔之設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" /> containing user profile information for profiles where the user name matches the supplied <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" />，包含設定檔的使用者設定檔資訊，其中使用者名稱符合所提供的 <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> 參數。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method returns a list of profile information for which the user name for the profile matches the supplied `usernameToMatch` parameter value for the configured <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>方法會傳回設定檔的使用者名稱符合所提供的設定檔資訊清單`usernameToMatch`所設定的參數值<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.ApplicationName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> searches for a match of the `usernameToMatch` parameter value using the `LIKE` keyword and supports wildcard characters, such as the percent (%) sign.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>搜尋符合的項目`usernameToMatch`參數值使用`LIKE`關鍵字，並支援萬用字元，例如百分比 （%） 符號。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user1", then profile information for the profile with the user name of "user1" is returned, if it exists.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果`usernameToMatch`參數設定為"user1"，則會傳回具有使用者名稱的設定檔的設定檔資訊，稱為"user1"，如果存在的話。

trans-unit.source: If the `usernameToMatch` parameter is set to "user%", then profile information for profiles with the user name of "user1", "user2", "user_admin", and so on are returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果`usernameToMatch`參數設定為"user %"，則會傳回設定檔資訊的設定檔的使用者名稱為"user1"、"user2"、"user_admin"，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: Users are returned in the order that their profiles were added to the data store.
trans-unit.target: 使用者會傳回其設定檔已加入到資料存放區的順序。

trans-unit.source: The results returned by <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的結果<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。

trans-unit.source: The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> objects to return in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>.
trans-unit.target: `pageSize`參數識別的最大數目<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo>物件中傳回<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; 0 identifies the first page.
trans-unit.target: `pageIndex`參數識別要傳回的結果的分頁，則為 0 識別的第一頁。

trans-unit.source: The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為指定的應用程式的非作用中的使用者設定檔的總數`applicationName`屬性在組態檔中，根據`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`參數。

trans-unit.source: For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> returned will contain the sixth through the tenth profiles.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果有設定 13 使用者`applicationName`，和`pageIndex`值為 1 以`pageSize`5，<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>傳回包含第 6 到第十個設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。

trans-unit.source: The following code example allows a user to supply a `usernameToMatch` value and a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption> and retrieves profile information for any matching profiles.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者提供`usernameToMatch`值和<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption>和擷取設定檔的任何相符的設定檔的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The example also allows the user to specify whether to return inactive profiles exclusively.
trans-unit.target: 此範例也可讓使用者能夠指定是否要以獨佔方式傳回非作用中的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: If the user specifies only inactive profiles, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A> method is called; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者指定只有非作用中設定檔，<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindInactiveProfilesByUserName%2A>方法是呼叫，否則<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.FindProfilesByUserName%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> is an empty string ("") or exceeds 256 characters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> 為空字串 ("") 或超過 256 個字元。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="pageIndex" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pageIndex" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="pageSize" /> is less than one.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pageSize" /> 小於一。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="pageIndex" /> multiplied by <paramref name="pageSize" /> is larger than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pageIndex" /> 乘以 <paramref name="pageSize" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are returned.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> 的其中一個值，指定是否要傳回匿名、已驗證或是這兩種類型的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that identifies which user profiles are considered inactive.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，識別哪些使用者設定檔視為非現用。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate" /> of a user profile occurs on or before this date and time, the profile is considered inactive.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔的 <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate" /> 發生在這個日期與時間或之前，則會將其視為非使用中設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The index of the page of results to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的結果頁面索引。

trans-unit.source: <c>pageIndex</c> is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: <c>pageIndex</c> 以零為起始。

trans-unit.source: The size of the page of results to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的結果頁面大小。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an integer that identifies the total number of profiles.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，包含識別設定檔總數的整數。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves user profile data for profiles in which the last activity date occurred on or before the specified date and time.
trans-unit.target: 擷取設定檔的使用者設定檔資料，其中設定檔的上次活動日期是發生在指定的日期和時間或之前。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" /> containing user profile information about the inactive profiles.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" />，包含關於非現用設定檔的使用者設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A> method is used to retrieve profile information from the data source for unused user profiles for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>方法用來擷取指定的應用程式的未使用的使用者設定檔的資料來源的設定檔資訊`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Of the searched profiles, any profile with a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> that occurs before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value is returned.
trans-unit.target: 任何設定檔的搜尋的設定檔與<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>發生此情況之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`傳回參數的值。

trans-unit.source: The results returned by <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A> are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的結果<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。

trans-unit.source: The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> objects to return in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>.
trans-unit.target: `pageSize`參數識別的最大數目<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo>物件中傳回<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; 0 identifies the first page.
trans-unit.target: `pageIndex`參數識別要傳回的結果的分頁，則為 0 識別的第一頁。

trans-unit.source: The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為非作用中的使用者設定檔所設定的總數`applicationName`根據`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`參數。

trans-unit.source: For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> returned will contain the sixth through the tenth inactive profiles.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果有設定 13 使用者`applicationName`，和`pageIndex`值為 1 以`pageSize`5，<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>傳回包含第 6 到第十個非使用中的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows an ASP.NET page that manages inactive profiles.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例顯示的 ASP.NET 網頁，管理非使用中的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: A button is provided to delete all inactive profiles.
trans-unit.target: 提供的按鈕來刪除非使用中的所有設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Whether a profile is considered inactive is based on the date specified for the `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 設定檔是否視為非使用中時，根據針對指定的日期`userInactiveSinceDate`參數。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pageIndex" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pageIndex" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="pageSize" /> is less than one.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pageSize" /> 小於一。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="pageIndex" /> multiplied by <paramref name="pageSize" /> is larger than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pageIndex" /> 乘以 <paramref name="pageSize" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are returned.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> 的其中一個值，指定是否要傳回匿名、已驗證或是這兩種類型的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The index of the page of results to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的結果頁面索引。

trans-unit.source: <c>pageIndex</c> is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: <c>pageIndex</c> 以零為起始。

trans-unit.source: The size of the page of results to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回的結果頁面大小。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains an integer that identifies the total number of profiles.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，包含識別設定檔總數的整數。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves user profile data for profiles in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 擷取資料來源中設定檔的使用者設定檔資料。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" /> containing user profile information for all of the profiles in the data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection" />，包含資料來源中所有設定檔的使用者設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A> method is used to retrieve profile information for profiles from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.GetAllProfiles%2A>方法用來從指定的應用程式的資料來源擷取的設定檔的設定檔資訊`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The results returned by <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A> are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters.
trans-unit.target: 所傳回的結果<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.GetAllInactiveProfiles%2A>受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`參數。

trans-unit.source: The `pageSize` parameter identifies the maximum number of <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo> objects to return in the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>.
trans-unit.target: `pageSize`參數識別的最大數目<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo>物件中傳回<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The `pageIndex` parameter identifies which page of results to return; 0 identifies the first page.
trans-unit.target: `pageIndex`參數識別要傳回的結果的分頁，則為 0 識別的第一頁。

trans-unit.source: The `totalRecords` parameter is an `out` parameter that is set to the total number of inactive user profiles for the configured `applicationName`, based on the `authenticationOption` and `userInactiveSinceDate` parameters.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords`參數是`out`參數設為非作用中的使用者設定檔所設定的總數`applicationName`根據`authenticationOption`和`userInactiveSinceDate`參數。

trans-unit.source: For example, if there are 13 users for the configured `applicationName`, and the `pageIndex` value is 1 with a `pageSize` of 5, the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection> returned will contain the sixth through the tenth profiles.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，如果有設定 13 使用者`applicationName`，和`pageIndex`值為 1 以`pageSize`5，<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfoCollection>傳回包含第 6 到第十個設定檔。

trans-unit.source: The `totalRecords` parameter will be set to 13.
trans-unit.target: `totalRecords`參數會設定為 13。

trans-unit.source: The following code example displays profile information for all of the profiles for the configured `applicationName` in pages of data.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會顯示所有設定的設定檔的設定檔資訊`applicationName`資料頁面中。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="pageIndex" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pageIndex" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="pageSize" /> is less than one.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pageSize" /> 小於一。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
<paramref name="pageIndex" /> multiplied by <paramref name="pageSize" /> is larger than <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="pageIndex" /> 乘以 <paramref name="pageSize" /> 大於 <see cref="F:System.Int32.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> values, specifying whether anonymous, authenticated, or both types of profiles are returned.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileAuthenticationOption" /> 的其中一個值，指定是否要傳回匿名、已驗證或是這兩種類型的設定檔。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that identifies which user profiles are considered inactive.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />，識別哪些使用者設定檔視為非現用。

trans-unit.source: If the <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate" /> of a user profile occurs on or before this date and time, the profile is considered inactive.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用者設定檔的 <see cref="P:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate" /> 發生在這個日期與時間或之前，則會將其視為非使用中設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of profiles in the data source where the last activity date occurred on or before the specified <paramref name="userInactiveSinceDate" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得資料來源中上次活動日期發生在指定的 <paramref name="userInactiveSinceDate" /> 當天或之前的設定檔數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of profiles in the data source for which the last activity date occurred before the specified date and time.
trans-unit.target: 資料來源中上次活動日期發生在指定的日期和時間之前的設定檔數目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.GetNumberOfInactiveProfiles%2A> method is used to retrieve a count of all of the unused user profiles from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.GetNumberOfInactiveProfiles%2A>方法用來從指定的應用程式的資料來源擷取的未使用的使用者設定檔的所有計數`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the `authenticationOption` parameter to specify whether you want only anonymous profiles, only authenticated profiles, or all profiles to be searched.
trans-unit.target: 使用`authenticationOption`參數來指定您是否只有匿名設定檔，只會驗證設定檔或要搜尋的所有設定檔。

trans-unit.source: Of the searched profiles, all profiles with a <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate%2A> that occurs on or before the specified `userInactiveSinceDate` parameter value are counted.
trans-unit.target: 搜尋設定檔與所有設定檔<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileInfo.LastActivityDate%2A>，就會發生在或之前指定`userInactiveSinceDate`參數值會計算。

trans-unit.source: The following code example allows a user to view and delete active and inactive profiles information based on search criteria.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例可讓使用者檢視和刪除根據搜尋準則的作用中和非使用中的設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: A count of inactive profiles is displayed using the results of the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.GetNumberOfInactiveProfiles%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用的結果顯示非作用中的設定檔的計數<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.GetNumberOfInactiveProfiles%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsContext" /> that contains user profile information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsContext" />，包含使用者設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection" /> containing profile information for the properties to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyCollection" />，包含要擷取的屬性之設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves profile property information and values from a SQL Server profile database.
trans-unit.target: 從 SQL Server 設定檔資料庫擷取設定檔屬性資訊和值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValueCollection" /> containing profile property information and values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValueCollection" />，包含設定檔屬性資訊和值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.GetPropertyValues%2A> method is used by the <xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase> class to retrieve profile properties for the current request that are managed by the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.GetPropertyValues%2A>方法由<xref:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase>類別來擷取受目前要求之設定檔屬性<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>。

trans-unit.source: Property values are returned from the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 從指定的應用程式的資料來源會傳回屬性值`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Property values and additional property information are returned as a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue> objects.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值和其他屬性資訊的集合傳回<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example lists the profile properties and values identified in the current profile.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會列出設定檔屬性和目前的設定檔中識別值。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider" /> instance to initialize.
trans-unit.target: 要初始化的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider" /> 執行個體之名稱。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> that contains the names and values of configuration options for the profile provider.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />，包含設定檔提供者之組態選項的名稱和值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the SQL Server profile provider with the property values specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ASP.NET 應用程式的組態檔所指定的屬性值，初始化 SQL Server 設定檔提供者。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不能從程式碼直接使用。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET uses this method to initialize the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> with the property values specified in the ASP.NET application configuration file (Web.config).
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 會使用這個方法來初始化<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>與 ASP.NET 應用程式組態檔 (Web.config) 中指定的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不能從程式碼直接使用。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="connectionStringName" /> attribute is an empty string ("") or is not specified in the application configuration file for this <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="connectionStringName" /> 屬性為空字串 ("") 或在這個 <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider" /> 執行個體的應用程式組態檔中未指定。

trans-unit.source: \- or -

The value of the connection string specified in the <see langword="connectionStringName" /> attribute value is empty or the specified <see langword="connectionStringName" /> value does not exist in the application configuration file for this <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="connectionStringName" /> 屬性值中指定之連接字串的值為空的，或指定的 <see langword="connectionStringName" /> 值不存在這個 <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider" /> 執行個體的應用程式組態檔中。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The <see langword="applicationName" /> attribute value exceeds 256 characters.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="applicationName" /> 屬性值超過 256 個字元。

trans-unit.source: \- or -
The application configuration file for this <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider" /> instance contains an unrecognized attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider" /> 執行個體的應用程式組態檔包含無法辨認的屬性。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="config" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="config" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The current trust level is less than <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Low" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前信任的層級小於 <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Low" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsContext" /> that contains user profile information.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsContext" />，包含使用者設定檔資訊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValueCollection" /> containing profile information and values for the properties to be updated.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValueCollection" />，包含要更新的屬性之設定檔資訊和值。

trans-unit.source: Updates the SQL Server profile database with the specified property values.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的屬性值更新 SQL Server 設定檔資料庫。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.SetPropertyValues%2A> method is used by ASP.NET profile services to update the SQL Server profile database when property values are set for the current request.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.SetPropertyValues%2A>方法可由 ASP.NET 設定檔服務來更新 SQL Server 分析資料庫，當屬性值會設定目前的要求。

trans-unit.source: Property values are set at the data source for the application specified by the `applicationName` attribute in the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 屬性值會設定在指定的應用程式的資料來源`applicationName`組態檔中的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Profile property information and values to be updated by the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider> are specified as a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue> objects.
trans-unit.target: 設定檔屬性資訊和更新的值<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider>做為集合指定<xref:System.Configuration.SettingsPropertyValue>物件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.SetPropertyValues%2A> method to modify profile property values.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Web.Profile.SqlProfileProvider.SetPropertyValues%2A>方法來修改設定檔屬性值。
